Name: Herald of Olympus
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with the Quarterstaff.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model with a Rend Characteristic of -3 or better are treated as having a Rend Characteristic of -2.

Spells.Name: Heralds of War (15)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 12" of this Formation The selected Formation suffers X Ethereal Damage where X is the number of models in the casting Formation.
